subscription.journal.placeholder:
The journal serves you as a farmer to document the progress of the order. The point is to have all necessary information in one place when preparing the delivery. The customer cannot see the journal

Usage example:
6/22/2021: First delivery
6/29/2021: Second delivery
7/6/2021: Third delivery
7/13/2021: Customer requested to postpone one delivery because of a vacation
7/20/2021: Fourth delivery
...
9/14/2021: Last delivery - order completed

For example, you can let the farmer know, what are your favorite vegetables, so he knows, what to grow more of and less of.


Favorite vegetables: tomatoes, carrots, lettuce, cucumbers

Disliked vegetables: celery stalks, dill
